meanings.definition: A person who has been convicted of a felony.
meanings.sent1: The felons were taken to prison after being found guilty.
meanings.sent2: The judge sentenced the felons to many years behind bars.
meanings.sent3: The group of felons tried to escape by dressing up as guards.
meanings.sent4: In the eyes of the law, felons carry the weight of their past actions.
meanings.sent5: The community was shocked to discover that their neighbor was one of the felons.

meanings.definition: A criminal who has committed a serious crime.
meanings.sent1: The police were on the lookout for the felons who robbed the bank.
meanings.sent2: The felons were apprehended after a high-speed chase.
meanings.sent3: The felons thought they could outsmart the authorities, but justice caught up with them.
meanings.sent4: The city was plagued by a gang of felons causing chaos.
meanings.sent5: The felons' actions left a lasting impact on the community.
